item.title: Communal areas scattered with urine and feces, 17th July
item.description:
The communal areas on all entrances and all staircases have not been cleaned at all since the 11th of July despite scheduled cleaning being due twice per week.prior to the cleaning that happened in the 11th of July, they had not been cleaned for 9 weeks! At present there is urine and excrement all over communal stairs that lead to the entrance of flat. It seems scheduled mopping is now regularly avoided unless a complaint is made. Mopping should happen twice per week according to the service agreement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 116, Sedgmoor Place, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vehicle not moved in over a year, 17th July
item.description:
This vehicle has not moved on over a year. It is making it hard for people to see round turnings and has nearly caused a number of clashes Rubbish is piling up around it and believed might be owned by same person that left other car there

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bognor Road, West Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped vehicle, 17th July
item.description:
Been here for over a year. Has no MOT and street cleaners have to go round it leaving road a mess. Has cobwebs on all wheels and definitely not being used . It's an eye sore

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bognor Road, West Heath, London

item.title: Woodbank road br1-5hh, 17th July
item.description:
This road is 20mph but throughout the day & night cars are speeding down here at over double that as they use this road as a cut through to avoid traffic lights, if this carries on a pet or child is going to get hit!!!!! We need these cut throughs blocked off with plant pots/cameras to stop this behaviour
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woodbank Road, Downham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping on private property, 17th July
item.description:
I am one of the housing officers from Clarion Housing at 81 Hanover Park, SE15 5HE. This vehicle has been seen on numerous occasions dumping rubbish on our premises. Can you please assist in issuing them a fine ?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 81, Hanover Park, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
